sub_questions.explanation: দেওয়া আছে, B = sec ⁡ θ − tan ⁡ θ B=\sec \theta-\tan \theta B = sec θ − tan θ এবং B = 1 3 B=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} B = 3 ​ 1 ​ ∴ sec ⁡ θ − tan ⁡ θ = 1 3 \therefore \sec \theta-\tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} ∴ sec θ − tan θ = 3 ​ 1 ​ বা, 3 sec ⁡ θ − 3 tan ⁡ θ = 1 \sqrt{3} \sec \theta-\sqrt{3} \tan \theta=1 3 ​ sec θ − 3 ​ tan θ = 1 বা, 3 sec ⁡ θ = 1 + 3 tan ⁡ θ \sqrt{3} \sec \theta=1+\sqrt{3} \tan \theta 3 ​ sec θ = 1 + 3 ​ tan θ বা, ( 3 sec ⁡ θ ) 2 = ( 1 + 3 tan ⁡ θ ) 2 (\sqrt{3} \sec \theta)^{2}=(1+\sqrt{3} \tan \theta)^{2} ( 3 ​ sec θ ) 2 = ( 1 + 3 ​ tan θ ) 2 বা, 3 sec ⁡ 2 θ = 1 + 2 3 tan ⁡ θ + 3 tan ⁡ 2 θ 3 \sec ^{2} \theta=1+2 \sqrt{3} \tan \theta+3 \tan ^{2} \theta 3 sec 2 θ = 1 + 2 3 ​ tan θ + 3 tan 2 θ বা, 3 + 3 tan ⁡ 2 θ = 1 + 2 3 tan ⁡ θ + 3 tan ⁡ 2 θ [ ∵ sec ⁡ 2 θ = 1 + tan ⁡ 2 θ ] 3+3 \tan ^{2} \theta=1+2 \sqrt{3} \tan \theta+3 \tan ^{2} \theta\left[\because \sec ^{2} \theta=1+\tan ^{2} \theta\right] 3 + 3 tan 2 θ = 1 + 2 3 ​ tan θ + 3 tan 2 θ [ ∵ sec 2 θ = 1 + tan 2 θ ] বা, 2 3 tan ⁡ θ = 2 2 \sqrt{3} \tan \theta=2 2 3 ​ tan θ = 2 ∴ tan ⁡ θ = 1 3 = tan ⁡ π 6 \therefore \tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}=\tan \frac{\pi}{6} ∴ tan θ = 3 ​ 1 ​ = tan 6 π ​ ∴ θ = π 6 \therefore \theta=\frac{\pi}{6} ∴ θ = 6 π ​ (Ans.)
